title: Stuck Together
description:
I know I should stay away from my hot, younger nanny.But the State of New York insists we stay home together.The entire state is on lockdown.I can't leave the mansion I just inherited.And neither can my six-year-old niece.I've never had to raise a child before.But my sister's unexpected passing has left me with no choice.I have help from my nanny but that's turning into trouble fast.Becky is as feisty as she is gorgeous.I'm used to being the one in charge.I want her out of here, but I can't resist her curvy body.I wish I could put her over my knee and spank her.Now that we're forced to shelter in place, I just might have to.She has to remain under my roof.And hopefully under my control.But the way she looks at me melts my resolve, and my heart.
Am I falling for the one person I'm not supposed to be with?And is it just a quarantine crush or can this love last forever?
Stuck Together is a standalone romance with no cheating, no cliffhanger and a very happily ever after.
author: Jamie Knight
